EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Honeywell Family
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WELCOME TO THE FAMILY Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}.
My name is Gus (Gustavo) Garayzar Rodriguez. We are delighted to have you onboard as a new customer. I will always be your point of escalation if you are not getting the support you need elsewhere. You can reach me at:
Direct: 636-486-2035
Mobile: 480-257-8995
Email: Gustavo.Garayzar@Honeywell.com
I want to introduce you to some important information to get you started. Here are a few important resources: Aircraft-On-Ground (AOG) Support
Please contact us at
+1-602-365-3099 (option #4)
1-800-601-3099 (also option #4) U.S. Toll Free
AOG@honeywell.com
Please include pertinent details your tail number, your next scheduled flight and the reason for the AOG. Technical Support
Please contact our global technical support at
+1-602-365-6500
1-855-808-6500 U.S. Toll Free
aerotechsupport@honeywell.com
Or visit our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> for more information. Direct Access
Download a free app - Apple or Android – that can get you to a support or sales person right away. DOWNLOAD <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]> Maintenance Service Plan
Our Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/maintenance-service-plan]]> adds value to your aircraft. We also offer Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/avionics-protection-plan]]>, and Mechanical Protection Plan <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/mechanical-protection-plan]]>. Request your estimate today by filling out the form listed on any of these pages. This is the first of a few emails I’ll send you to welcome you to the Honeywell family.
In the meantime, please reach out with any questions.
Gus Garayzar Rodriguez
Manager, Customer Support
Direct: 636-486-2035
Mobile: 480-257-8995
Email: Gustavo.Garayzar@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Gustavo.Garayzar@Honeywell.com]]>
